result.execSummary:
Cody L Dema was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Cody L Dema was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Extradition Request for Bond Revocation filed by KSD

State appears by Attorney Drew Lehman. Defendant Cody L Dema appears in custody.  Clerk: PU
  Minutes:  DE waives extradition and elects to return to McHenry County, Illinois.  DE signs waiver of extradition and Court grants the extradition.  DE's bond is Revoked. (Amended bond given to Deputy Meshenky)
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.

01:20 PM  
  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Seth Johnson.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Deft will waive extradtition.  Extradition hearing scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Br 3. $25,000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).    jk
